Name: Miracle Eye
Effect: Target Self. The User's Psychic-Type Moves ignore Dark-Type Immunity. Targets cannot Evade the User's Moves. This Pokémon's Accuracy cannot be Reduced by Moves, Items, or Abilities. (eg. Sand Attack, Bright Powder, etc.). Whole Scene Duration.
Description: The Pokémon opens up the third eye. Their sight trascends the barriers of flesh. No one goes undetected.
